<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_inmis_im_itad_workorder</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_inmis_im_itad_workorder">workorder_status=wo_submitted^EQ<item display_value="Submitted" endquery="false" field="workorder_status" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="wo_submitted"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Workorder cahnges to Submitted</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	gs.addInfoMessage('WorkOrder is being submitted. Please check the status');

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Munimohan.Bathala@ness.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-07-29 07:11:28</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>b212eaeddb529c108a521fe9689619e0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Workorder cahnges to Submitted</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Ingram Micro IT Asset Disposition" source="x_inmis_im_itad">df95bbf0dbc17f008a521fe968961950</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Ingram Micro IT Asset Disposition">df95bbf0dbc17f008a521fe968961950</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_b212eaeddb529c108a521fe9689619e0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Munimohan.Bathala@ness.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-07-29 07:44:00</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=b212eaeddb529c108a521fe9689619e0"/></record_update>
